scripts.dev: nodemon --watch src --ext ts --exec "npx ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/main.ts"
scripts.start:prod: cd ../.. && MAIN_FILE=$(find apps/websocket/dist -name 'main.js' -type f 2>/dev/null | head -1) && if [ -n "$MAIN_FILE" ]; then NODE_PATH=.:packages:apps/websocket/node_modules:evoque-api/generated node -r tsconfig-paths/register "$MAIN_FILE"; else echo 'Error: main.js not found in apps/websocket/dist directory' && find apps/websocket/dist -type f -name '*.js' 2>/dev/null | head -10 && exit 1; fi
